title: Eryn exposed what high school is really like in 2021
description:
This week on Fool Coverage, Manny and Laura invite an extra special guest/Laura's niece, Eryn Weaver! They talk all about embarrassing school moments, high school crushes and what it's like going to school in California. She also dishes what it's like living with Laura and Tyler, and much more!
Follow Eryn on IG: @eryn.weaver
Check out Eryn's YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiIsVg4I4cNR5BseKAZTJ-A.
Follow Laura on IG: @larlarlee
Follow Manny on IG: @mannymua733

More about the show: 
Don’t forget to subscribe to the podcast for free wherever you're listening or using this link: https://bit.ly/FoolCoverage
Check out Fool Coverage on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKlJLwZV472zWlO9eQv4RGg.

Thanks to our sponsors:

Right now, Modern Fertility is offering our listeners $20 off the test when you go to modernfertility.com/FOOL.

You can grow thicker, healthier hair AND support our show by going to nutrafol.com/FOOL to save $15 OFF your first month’s subscription -- this is their best offer ANYWHERE and it is only available to US customers for a limited time.

Go to hellofresh.com/14fool and use code 14fool for up to 14 free meals AND 3 free gifts!

We want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at betterhelp.com/foolcoverage.
